O

ObjectPeer - Class in coarsermi
 
ObjectPeer(Socket, ObjectRegistry) - Constructor for class coarsermi.ObjectPeer
Constructs a new ObjectPeer over the connection specified by the given socket, with the specified ObjectRegistry.
ObjectRegistry - Class in coarsermi
Defines a registry of exported objects on the local machine.
ObjectRegistry() - Constructor for class coarsermi.ObjectRegistry
 
ObjectServer - Class in coarsermi
Defines a simple class that accepts new TCP connections over a port of the local machine and automatically creates and manages the object peers to simply export services.
ObjectServer() - Constructor for class coarsermi.ObjectServer
Creates a new Object server with a new empty object registry
ObjectServer(ObjectRegistry) - Constructor for class coarsermi.ObjectServer
Creates a new Object server, with the specified registry
